Installing &SgpDec; SgpDec is currently hosted on GitHub, as a member project of the gap-packages virtual organization. The latest release and the Git repository can be found at https://github.com/gap-packages/sgpdec.
Given that you have a working copy of the latest complete &GAP; system on a UNIX machine you can install SgpDec with the following commands. GAPROOT should be substituted with the main &GAP; directory (the one containing the folders `bin', `lib', and so on), and '*' by the latest version numbers.
> gunzip sgpdec-*.tar.gz > tar -xf sgpdec-*.tar > mv sgpdec GAPROOT/pkg > gap
Then after starting &GAP; the package can be loaded by:
gap> LoadPackage("SgpDec");
which command prints version information and should return true. This also loads the packages that SgpDec depends on.
